content.text: These are the first eight terms of a sequence
Find the value of \(c\) and the value of \(k\)
c =
k =
The diagram shows an isosceles triangle
Find the value of \(x\)
x =
Complete each statement with a number from the list
is a natural number
is an irrational number
is the reciprocal of 4
One of the buildings has 67 rooms
Write down the number of people in this building
In another building there are 42 people and 33 rooms
On the scatter diagram, plot this point
On the scatter diagram, draw a line of best fit
There are 45 people in a different building
Find an estimate for the number of rooms in this building
What type of correlation is shown in the scatter diagram?
The scatter diagram shows the number of rooms and the number of people in each of eight buildings
Convert \(7.51 \mathrm{~m}^{2}\) into \(\mathrm{cm}^{2}\)
The diagram shows a trapezium
The area of the trapezium is \(42 \mathrm{~cm}^2\)
Calculate the value of \(x\)
Without using a calculator, work out \(\frac{2}{7} \div \frac{6}{11}\)
You must show all your working and give your answer as a fraction in its simplest form
The diagram shows a parallelogram
Work out the size of the smallest interior angle of the parallelogram
Points \(A, B, C\) and \(D\) lie on a circle
\(ABCD\) is a square with area \(72 \text{cm}^2\)
Calculate the area of the circle
Give your answer as a multiple of \(\pi\)
Calculate \(\sqrt[3]{1 + 10.9 \times 0.4^2}\)
Factorise fully
\(y\) is directly proportional to the square root of \(x + 1\)
Find \(y\) when \(x = 1.56\)
The region \(R\) satisfies these inequalities
By drawing suitable straight lines and shading **unwanted** regions, find and label the region \(R\)
Find the acceleration of the car during the first 10 seconds
Calculate the total distance travelled by the car during the 17 seconds
The diagram shows the speed–time graph for 17 seconds of a car journey
At the start of an experiment there are 40 000 bacteria
The number of bacteria increases at a rate of \(15\%\) per hour
Calculate the number of bacteria after 3 hours
75 people are asked if they have a car, \(C\), and if they have a job, \(J\)
The Venn diagram shows the results
A person is chosen at random from those who have a car
Find the probability that this person also has a job
\(A, B\) and \(C\) are points on the circumference of a circle with centre \(O\)
\(DA\) and \(DC\) are tangents to the circle
Angle \(ABC = 64^\circ\)
Work out the value of \(x\)
\(\xi = \{8 \times 10^{- 1}, \qquad 0.8, \qquad 8\%, \qquad \sqrt{0.08}\}\)
B = { \(b\colon b \geqslant 0.8\) }
Complete the Venn diagram
Shade the region \((A \cup C) \cap B'\) in the Venn diagram
Calculate the volume of the solid
[The volume, \(V,\) of a sphere with radius \(r\) is \(V = \frac{4}{3}\pi r^3.\) ]
Calculate the total surface area of the solid
[The surface area, \(A\), of a sphere with radius \(r\) is \(A = 4\pi r^2\).]
A solid is made from a cylinder and a hemisphere, both of radius 4.3 cm
The cylinder has length \(11.9 \mathrm{cm}\)
Find an expression for the \(n\)th term of this sequence
Expand and simplify
\(A\) is the point (17, 9) and \(B\) is the point (23, 39)
Find the equation of the perpendicular bisector of line \(AB\)
Give your answer in the form \(y = mx + c\)
The small box is mathematically similar to the large box
The volume of the large box is \(72.8\%\) greater than the volume of the small box
The small box has length \(3.5 \text{cm}\) and the large box has length \(x \text{cm}\)
Calculate the value of \(x\)
